alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Wrangell (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 24 at 3:02PM AKST until December 24 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW CONTINUES OVER THE CENTRAL PANHANDLE THIS EVENING... Snow continues to be heavy to moderate over the Kupreanof Island and Kuiu Island areas this evening. Another round of snow is expected for the northern panhandle Sun afternoon into Sun night. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Storm total snow accumulation of 7 to 10 inches. * WHERE...City and Borough of Wrangell. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Possible power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow rates continue to be moderate in intensity around the area. Around 4 to 5 inches of snow has been observed around midday. Expect another 2 to 4 inches through this evening with low visibility at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
